publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Ecclesiastes 12
ab.l: Da saɣynɣyn jaratuvčujnu vaḥtynda sajlanmaḥlaryjnyn ńegińč́a ki keĺḿaǵejĺar ḱuńĺari ol jamanlyḥnyn da jet́arĺar jyllaryj ki ajtyrsyn joḥtur ḿenim alarda kĺagim.
Ńegińč́a ki qaranɣy bolmady ol qujaš da ol jaryḥ da jaryɣy ajnyn da ol julduzlar da qajtyrlar kipligi ol buvunlarnyn artḥary ol guftan.
Ńe vaḥtta ki siĺkinirĺar buvunlary ol adamnyn da qynɣyrajyrlar ol tuvušlu ėĺ da batyl bolurlar ol tiš́ĺar ki azaryrlar da qaranɣy bolurlar ol ḱoŕuv́č́uĺar t́eŕaž́aĺard́a.
Da b́ekĺanir- ĺar ačylmaḥlary avuznun juvuzluɣu byla avazynyn ol śoź- ĺaḿakniń da talyr avazy ol sarnamaḥnyn da ėńḱajirĺar bar buvunlary ol jyrlamaḥnyn.

Daɣy bijikt́ań qorḥarlar da synyɣyrlar üŕuš́ĺa- rińd́a da č́eč́akĺanir ol badam tajaɣy kibik čalarmaɣy čačnyn da avurlanyr gufḥa ḱot́urḿagi ol č́eǵart́ḱaniń da buzulur ol kĺak ki barsa ol adam öḿurĺuk üv́uńa da quršarlar oramda ol syjyt ėt́uv́č́uĺar.

Ńegińč́a ki burulmady
synǯyry ḱuśańč́niń da synyɣyr ukšasy ol altyn qulpanyn ol- dur bašy adamnyn da synar ḱuśańḿagi čapčaɣynyn ol qarynnyn topraḥ- qa da juvurur ol guf źeŕat́ḱa.
Da qajtyr ol topraḥ ol jerǵa ki ńečik ėdi da ol ǯan qajtyr ol T́eńriǵa ki b́erdi any.
Hečliktir bu dunjalyḥ ajtty ištyruvču uslarny ol barysy hečtir.
Da artyḥ ki ėdi Kohelet uslu da üv́- ŕatti biĺḿakni ol ulusḥa da qulaḥ saldyrdy da t́erǵadi da t́uźud́u ḱop mašallar.
Iźĺadi Kohelet tapma śoźĺariń kĺakniń da jazylɣan t́uźĺuǵu kerti śoźĺariniń.
Śoźĺari uslular- nyn okst́eńĺar kibik da b́ek qadavlar kibik ornatylɣanlar da ḥibur ėtiĺǵańĺar b́eriĺdiĺar bir ḱut́uv́č́ud́ań.
Da artyɣač alardan uvlum saqlanɣyn da zynharlanɣyn qylma śef́erĺar ḱop ki uč joḥtur da ḱop śoźĺaḿak jadavydyr gufnun.
Sofu śoźńuń ol barysy ėšitiĺdi ol T́eńrid́ań qorḥqun da saruvlaryn saqlaɣyn ki budur ḱeŕagi ḱečińḿaginiń bar ol adamnyn.
Ki bar jaratmaɣyn ol T́eńri keĺtirir t́oŕaǵa bar jašyryn ńerśaĺar üč́uń hem jaḥšy hem jaman. סוֺף דָבָר הַכֹל נִשְמָע אֶת הַאֱלֹהִים יְרָא וְאֶת מִצְוֺתֶיו שְמוֺר כִי זֶה כָל הָאָדָם׃ תם.

app.note: Heb. Ecc 12.13: ‘Let us hear the conclusion of the whole matter: fear God and keep His commandents, for this is man’s all’.
